name: Shimmer
description:
Enjoy unparalleled free sniping in the jungle shooting game.

Experience the tactical level of third person combat and epic long-range shooting in the lush deep forest, and clean up the zombies out of the forest.



As a secret agent, you must fight with zombies and defeat a terrible new threat, so as to avoid the forest being polluted by zombies.



In the intense and exciting game, you have to hunt and kill many enemies in each forest, and kill a road to your goal by yourself!




How to play

Use the mouse to adjust the shooting angle on the screen, and then click the left mouse button to fire.
